text: The Sunday Woman () is a 1975 Italian thriller movie directed by Luigi Comencini and based on the novel of the same name. It stars Marcello Mastroianni, Jacqueline Bisset, Jean-Louis Trintignant and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1975 thriller movies Category:Italian thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Luigi Comencini Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: The Sunday Woman (movie)
